[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.1 Purpose: The Real Estate Platform (REP) defines requirements for a professional, accessible UI with seamless interaction.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.2 Scope: REP provides a web and mobile system for realtors, ensuring usability and accessibility.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.4 Product Functions: REP offers a user-friendly platform with property search, customization, and dashboards.

[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.1 System Interfaces: REP integrates with cloud-based property databases and authentication APIs.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.2 User Interfaces: REP supports a responsive UI for web and mobile.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.3 Hardware Interfaces: REP is compatible with desktops, tablets, and smartphones.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.4 Software Interfaces: REP uses RESTful and GraphQL APIs.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.6 Memory Constraints: REP is optimized for fast searches.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.7 Operations: REP ensures high availability with cloud scaling.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.8 Site Adaptation Requir: REP supports accessibility, multilingual settings, and adaptive themes.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.9 Interfaces with Servic: REP links to mapping tools, payments, and CRM systems.

[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.5 User Characteristics: REP is designed for realtors and home buyers.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.7 Assumptions and Dependencie: REP relies on third-party APIs for listings and authentication.

[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-001: The system shall integrate with property databases via RESTful and GraphQL APIs for real-time listing updates.
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-002: The system shall support OAuth 2.0 authentication.

[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-001: The UI shall ensure a professional and intuitive experience (REQ-USAB-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-002: The system shall support light/dark mode customization.
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-003: The system shall provide property search filters (REQ-INTF-001).

[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-001: The UI shall provide an intuitive, user-friendly interface with keyboard navigation, screen reader compatibility, and WCAG-compliant accessibility features.
[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-002: The system shall be fully responsive across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices, ensuring seamless functionality and layout consistency.

[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-001: The UI shall load within 2 seconds under normal network conditions and support optimized performance for slower connections.
[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-002: The system shall process and return property search results within 500ms, ensuring low-latency, real-time updates for users.

[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-001: The system shall store user preferences and search history.
[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-002: The system shall log interactions for analytics and performance monitoring.

[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-001: The system shall follow ISO 25010 for UI consistency.
[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-002: The system shall comply with GDPR.

[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-001: The system shall support automated UI testing.

[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-001: The system shall comply with WCAG accessibility standards.
[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-002: The system shall encrypt user data using AES-256.

[SEC] 3. Verification: Tests UI consistency, API integration, and search performance. Validates responsiveness across devices.
[SEC] 4. Supporting Information: UI wireframes, API documentation, and usability reports.
